mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_resource(id, resource_code, resource_name, icon, resource_uri, resource_type, order_id, parent_id, enabled, description) values ( #{id}, #{resourceCode}, #{resourceName}, #{icon}, #{resourceUri}, #{resourceType}, #{orderId}, #{parentId}, #{enabled}, #{description} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_resource set resource_code = #{resourceCode}, resource_name = #{resourceName}, icon = #{icon}, resource_uri = #{resourceUri}, resource_type = #{resourceType}, order_id = #{orderId}, parent_id = #{parentId}, enabled = #{enabled}, description = #{description}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, resource_code as resourceCode, resource_name as resourceName, icon as icon, resource_uri as resourceUri, resource_type as resourceType, order_id as orderId, parent_id as parentId, enabled as enabled, description as description, version as version from t_sys_resource where id = #{id}
select version from t_sys_resource where id = #{id}

select id as id, resource_code as resourceCode, resource_name as resourceName, icon as icon, resource_uri as resourceUri, resource_type as resourceType, order_id as orderId, parent_id as parentId, enabled as enabled, description as description, version as version from t_sys_resource order by order_id

select id as id, resource_code as resourceCode, resource_name as resourceName, icon as icon, resource_uri as resourceUri, resource_type as resourceType, order_id as orderId, parent_id as parentId, enabled as enabled, description as description, version as version from t_sys_resource where id in (select resource_id from t_sys_authorization where user_id=#{userId}) order by order_id

select id as id, resource_code as resourceCode, resource_name as resourceName, icon as icon, resource_uri as resourceUri, resource_type as resourceType, order_id as orderId, parent_id as parentId, enabled as enabled, description as description, version as version from t_sys_resource where parent_id =#{id} order by order_id
